titleStmt.title: A Pleasant song, made by a souldier whose bringing vp had bin dainty, and partly fed by those affections of his vnbridled youth, is now beaten with his owne rod, and therefore tearmeth this his repentance, the fall of his folly : to the tune of Calino.

A Pleasant song, made by a souldier whose bringing vp had bin dainty, and partly fed by those affections of his vnbridled youth, is now beaten with his owne rod, and therefore tearmeth this his repentance, the fall of his folly : to the tune of Calino.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.)
Bound and filmed following STC (2nd ed.) 21056.8.
Imperfect: faded, with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys' Library.
